title: Addition of BlockReward in Clique
body:
i am trying to add block reward in clique . i have copied this code from Consensus/ethash/consensus.go and paste in Consensus/clique/clique.go.

 my code is  

```func accumulateRewards(config *params.ChainConfig, state *state.StateDB, header *types.Header, uncles []*types.Header) {
		// Select the correct block reward based on chain progression
		blockReward := FrontierBlockReward
		if config.IsByzantium(header.Number) {
			blockReward = ByzantiumBlockReward
		}
		// Accumulate the rewards for the miner and any included uncles
		reward := new(big.Int).Set(blockReward)
		r := new(big.Int)
		for _, uncle := range uncles {
			r.Add(uncle.Number, big8)
			r.Sub(r, header.Number)
			r.Mul(r, blockReward)
			r.Div(r, big8)
			state.AddBalance(uncle.Coinbase, r)
	
			r.Div(blockReward, big32)
			reward.Add(reward, r)
		}
		state.AddBalance(header.Coinbase, reward)
```

and call accumulateRewards function in Finalize function.
My finalize function is 

```func (c *Clique) Finalize(chain consensus.ChainReader, header *types.Header, state *state.StateDB, txs []*types.Transaction, uncles []*types.Header, receipts []*types.Receipt) (*types.Block, error) {
	// No block rewards in PoA, so the state remains as is and uncles are dropped
	accumulateRewards(chain.Config(), state, header, uncles)

	header.Root = state.IntermediateRoot(chain.Config().IsEIP158(header.Number))
	header.UncleHash = types.CalcUncleHash(nil)

	// Assemble and return the final block for sealing
	return types.NewBlock(header, txs, nil, receipts), nil
}
```

After these changing when i run make all command for rebuild  this error i will be face.
Error.

Well, your Go code is invalid. I've no idea what part of it is invalid since you only pasted in a tiny bit.
You're missing a closing brace for the `accumulateRewards` function body.
The issue is not a closing brace, i missed the closing brace while pasting the code here but in actually am putting closing brace in my function but still the issue persists.

> You're missing a closing brace for the `accumulateRewards` function body. Hi how to Addition of BlockReward in Clique , my verison is go-ethereum: 1.9.18, i add `accumulateRewards` in both `FinalizeAndAssemble` and `Finalize`, but when the node restart, it occurs err: it's anyway else i miss ?
